German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

an- +‎ melden

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʔanmɛldn̩/, /ˈʔanmɛldən/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

anmelden (third-person singular simple present meldet an, past tense meldete an, past participle angemeldet, auxiliary haben)

  1. to announce, declare
  2. to enroll
  3. to register
    Er hat seinen Wohnsitz bei der Gemeinde angemeldet.
    He registered his residence with the community.
